ai-tha-ap297:1.1_0: “Having gone forth in the monastery, they have no sense of urgency,
ai-tha-ap297:1.2_0: I’ve had a cow with slaves,
ai-tha-ap297:1.4_0: and it is the fruit of the past.
ai-tha-ap297:2.3_0: this is all just of us.
ai-tha-ap297:3.3_0: and creating schism in the Sangha.
ai-tha-ap297:4.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap297:4.2_0: that’s how I put a stack.
ai-tha-ap297:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap297:5.3_0: I was the one great sacrifice,
ai-tha-ap297:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Godhika.
ai-tha-ap297:8.1_0: The fifth section for recitation on Godhā the Elder Nun,
